mapper.select: SELECT orderNum,memberNum,goodsNum,goodsName,goodsCnt,goodsColor,goodsSize,goodsTotalCost,orderDate, recipient,recipientPhone,recipientZipCode,recipientAddress,recipientAddressEtc, parcelMessage,usePoint,orderStatus FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_HISTORY_ORDER ORDERNUM_PK)*/ ROWNUM R, orderNum,memberNum,goodsNum,goodsName,goodsCnt,goodsColor,goodsSize,goodsTotalCost,orderDate, recipient,recipientPhone,recipientZipCode,recipientAddress,recipientAddressEtc, parcelMessage,usePoint,orderStatus FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum} AND ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount} ) WHERE R > (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}

SELECT orderNum,memberNum,goodsNum,goodsName,goodsCnt,goodsColor,goodsSize,goodsTotalCost,orderDate, recipient,recipientPhone,recipientZipCode,recipientAddress,recipientAddressEtc, parcelMessage,usePoint,orderStatus FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY WHERE orderNum=#{orderNum}
SELECT COUNT(orderNum) FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum}
SELECT COUNT(orderNum) FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum} AND NOT orderStatus = 1
SELECT parcelNum, parcelCode, parcelKey, orderNum FROM TBL_PARCEL WHERE orderNum = #{orderNum}

SELECT orderNum,memberNum,goodsNum,goodsName,goodsCnt,goodsColor,goodsSize,goodsTotalCost,orderDate, recipient,recipientPhone,recipientZipCode,recipientAddress,recipientAddressEtc, parcelMessage,usePoint,orderStatus FROM TBL_ORDER_HISTORY WHERE orderStatus = 1;
